name: Flippity Frog
description:
How far can you go? Traverse the rivers in this addictive, fast-paced adventure as a small frog hopping quickly from lily pad to lily pad.  Be careful where to jump next, or you might fall in!

Features:
- Countdown timer bar to keep you going FAST!
- Retro-style pixel graphics
- Original soundtrack

How to Play:
- Tap left or right to move

Credits:
- Graphics, Music, and Code by roseforests
- NativeShare by yasirkula
